Week 7 Technical

SQL Injection & Hacking

So SQL injection is a process by which malicious users can inject SQL commands into a SQL statement via web page input. Ultimately, this can compromise the security of the web application. However, security can be added to a website for protection through SQL paramaters. These parameters are added to the SQL Query at runtime.

The SQL Inject issue is well documented on both the issue and the solution. However, it's noted that most sites experience a SQL injection attack 4 times per month. So it's definitely somehting to be aware of as we use SQL for databasing in our web applications. This is definitely the downside of creating something that contains valuable information and data.

Sources:Wikipedia W3School SQL Injection Cartoon
